DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect new orange juice-based beverage enrich fiber select phenolic compound ( mainly flavanones ) feature metabolic syndrome cardiovascular disease risk factor related inflammation antioxidant defense system overweight obese adult human . This study hypothesize consumption orange juice-based beverage enrich fiber select phenolic compound ( mainly flavanones ) would improve lipid level lipid metabolism , blood pressure Homeostatic Model Assessment ( HOMA ) index .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation New Orange-Based Beverage Enriched With Polyphenols Adult Humans
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) high 25 ( overweight obese ) low 40 ( extreme obesity ) waist circumference high 94 cm men 80 cm woman , alter least two marker MS namely : Hypertension ( diastolic pressure high 85 mmHg low 110 mmHg ) Hyperglycemia ( high 100 mg/dl low 130 mg/dl ) Elevated plasma triacylglycerol concentration ( high 150 mg/dl ) Decreased plasma HDLc level ( low 40 men 50 woman ) Volunteers otherwise healthy without take medication aim low either blood lipid , blood pressure blood glucose concentration . The presence morbid obesity Blood pressure high 110 mmHg Plasma glucose level higher 130 mg/dl The use medication control blood pressure glucose lipid metabolism Medical history consumption hypocaloric diet last year Disorders food conduct The presence familiar dislipemias relatives genetic character denial take part study .
